name: Banana Upside Down Cake
description: With cinnamon-caramel comfort, sweet bananas, and moist texture, we’re giving this retro classic its due. Dig in and you’ll see that some desserts never go out of style! It’s totally gluten-free, budget-friendly, and uses mostly pantry staples so it’s there for you in a pinch. Prep in 5 min, then set it and forget it in the oven!

ingredients.name: Morning Glory Muffin Mix or Sweet Banana Bread & Muffin Mix

preparation: Preheat oven to 350° F. Lightly oil 9" round cake pan.
In Prep Bowl, combine sugar and butter. Spread over bottom of pan.
Slice 1–1 1⁄2 bananas into thin rounds and arrange in bottom of pan. Mash remaining banana; set aside.
In a large bowl, whisk eggs with applesauce and oil. Stir in muffin mix and mashed banana until well combined. Scrape batter into pan.
Bake 35–40 min, or until toothpick comes out clean. Remove from oven; cool in pan.
Gently run knife around edge of pan to loosen cake. Carefully invert cake onto a plate or serving platter.
tips: To easily invert cake, place a Cooling Rack over top of cake and carefully flip over. Gently slide onto a plate or serving platter.

products.name: Morning Glory Muffin Mix (2pk)
summary: Say good morning to moist, gluten free muffins packed with chunks of carrots, apples, coconut, and cranberries. Bake a batch in the microwave in just 15 mins and take a moment to enjoy a warm fruity muffin with your fave warm drink – or easily take them on the go any time of day!

products.name: Sweet Banana Bread & Muffin Mix (Pack of 2)
summary: Perfectly sweet – not sugary – banana bread is ready in minutes with this delicious gluten free batter. Just add three ingredients – eggs (or an egg replacement), oil, and ripe mashed bananas – to make a fluffy, moist loaf, muffins, or Perfect Petites.

products.name: Cooling Rack (Set of 2)
summary: These space-saving cooling racks are an absolute must-have for every at-home baker or chef.
